ignore

Use ignore controller to ignore certain paths.

Usage

ignore(*sources: str or SiteItem)

Controller arguments

  • *sources – ignored items are match by sources, file matching supported.

Examples

Ignore file names in top directory with an underscore at the beginning:

ignore('_*')
